title: Melanie Griffith, 62, defies her years as she poses for sexy lingerie selfies
text:

Actress Melanie Griffith , 62, has sent her Instagram followers into meltdown after she shared a series of new snaps showing off her incredible figure.

The mum-of-three posed in a sexy black lingerie set as she took a mirror selfie in front of her wardrobe at home.

The Working Girl star modelled the new Kit Undergarments lingerie line from Simone Harouche and Jamie Mizrahi.

The image will remind eagle-eyed fans of a scene from the 1988 film Working Girl, in which she wore black underwear while hoovering her boss' home.

(Image: mirror.co.uk)

Comments instantly came flooding in, where fans praised the star for her incredible figure.

One wrote: "Wowza beautiful."

While another shared: "You must be super dedicated and work so hard to look so fit."

A third commented: "Goals!"

Another user said: "You look exactly the same as in The Working Girl!!!!!!! Gorgeous."

(Image: 20th Century Fox)

Melanie captioned the snaps: "So these 2 awesome, creative, incredibily chic stylists… @sweetbabyjamie and @simoneharouche have started this amazing new lingerie line @thekitundergatments."

Her blonde hair was worn down with soft waves and the actress accentuated her incredible figure by placing her hand on her pushed out hip.

Although these snaps prove Melanie is a confident woman, the Hollywood actress previously went through hard times when she was forced to have cancer cells removed from her nose in 2009.

(Image: mirror.co.uk)

This isn't the first time that the actress has flaunted her age-defying figure on social media as she often posts bikini snaps from her sun-soaked trips.

However, Melanie was previously forced to speak out about the cruel comments she receives online about her youthful appearance.

She said: "Most people are telling me I look horrible."

(Image: mirror.co.uk)

She continued: "I don’t know if I look that great, [but] I work out a lot. I have a trainer that I [work with] four times a week, and I do hot yoga."

The actress is known for keeping in shape and regularly shares her work out plans online.

She previously revealed she has used celebrity trainer Gunnar Peterson for seven years, who famously worked with Khloe Kardashian .
description: The 62-year-old actress showed off her impressive figure as she posed in just her black underwear and high highs
